action_item: Billing - Discuss the billing process in Dr. Cloud EHR and the ability to create claims.
notes: Include details on marking claims as billed without sending to a clearinghouse.

action_item: Billing - Update the rate tables and master charge list in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Focus on usual and customary rates and special scenarios using billing rules.

action_item: Reports - Generate a month-end closed report for the general ledger.
notes: Ensure it includes contract management for payers' contracted rates.

action_item: Requirements - Determine the requirements for sending encounters to Medicaid authority for reporting.
notes: Clarify the formatting needed for data submission.

action_item: Service Codes - Set up billing rules based on age and diagnoses for specific service codes.
notes: Implement rules that change billing status based on age of the client.

action_item: Data Migration - Export collections data to a CSV file for the collections agency.
notes: Ensure the data reflects individuals placed in collections.

action_item: Payers - Manage contracts with payers and set up contracted rates.
notes: Include details on how to adjust claims based on contracted rates.

action_item: Reports - Generate a net revenue report based on contracted rates.
notes: Ensure it shows expected revenue based on contracted rates.
